name: Automated Weekly Tech Stack Reports with BuiltWith, GPT-4o & Gmail

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

If you need any help with Automations, feel free to reach out via linkedin:

And check out my Youtube channel:

description:
Automated weekly report that summarizes technology stack changes, trends, and insights from your tracked companies.

## üöÄ What It Does

- Compiles weekly technology updates
- Highlights significant changes
- Identifies emerging trends
- Provides actionable insights
- Delivers scheduled reports

## üéØ Perfect For

- CTOs and technical leaders
- Sales and marketing teams
- Business intelligence
- Technology consultants
- Market researchers

## ‚öôÔ∏è Key Benefits

‚úÖ Weekly digest of changes  
‚úÖ Trend analysis  
‚úÖ Competitive intelligence  
‚úÖ Time-saving automation  
‚úÖ Data-driven decisions  

## üîß What You Need

- BuiltWith API access
- n8n instance
- Email service (for delivery)
- Google Sheets (for data storage)

## üìä Report Includes

- New technology adoptions
- Technology removals
- Industry trends
- Competitive analysis
- Custom metrics

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup & Support

### Quick Setup

Get your first report in 15 minutes with our step-by-step guide

### üì∫ Watch Tutorial

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/badge/YouTube-Watch_Tutorial-red?style=for-the-badge&logo=youtube)](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)

### üíº Get Expert Support

[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-Connect-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=linkedin)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)

### üìß Direct Help

[![Email](https://img.shields.io/badge/Email-Contact%20Us-green?style=for-the-badge&logo=gmail)](mailto:Yaron@nofluff.online)

Stay ahead of technology trends with a comprehensive weekly digest of your industry's technology landscape.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
## üì¶ **Section 1: Data Collection Stage**

**(Nodes: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Schedule Trigger + 2Ô∏è‚É£ Fetch Domain List)**

### üîÅ 1. Weekly Automation Trigger

üïò **Node Name: `Weekly Summary Trigger`**
‚è∞ **What it does:**
This node kicks off the entire workflow **automatically every Monday at 9 AM** ‚Äî no manual work needed!

üí° **Think of it like a morning alarm** for your workflow. Every week, it starts the process so you never forget to analyze the tech stacks again.

---

### üìÑ 2. Read Domains from Google Sheets

üóÇÔ∏è **Node Name: `Fetch Domain List`**
üì• **What it does:**
This node goes into your **Google Sheet** and pulls a list of ecommerce **website domains** (like `nike.com`, `asos.com`, etc.)

üîó *You just need to keep updating your Google Sheet whenever you want to analyze new ecommerce websites.*

---

### ‚úÖ **Summary of Section 1:**

This section **automates the start** and pulls the **input data (website list)** from a central, editable place (Google Sheets).

---

# üß† **Section 2: Tech Stack Intelligence Stage**

**(Nodes: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Get Tech Stack + 4Ô∏è‚É£ Parse Tech Info)**

### üåê 3. Fetch Tech Stack via BuiltWith

üîß **Node Name: `Get Tech Stack (BuiltWith API)`**
üì° **What it does:**
This node sends each domain from the sheet to [BuiltWith](https://builtwith.com) ‚Äî a powerful tool that tells you **which technologies** a website is using.

üí¨ For example:
`nike.com` ‚Üí Shopify, Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.

üì¨ It does this using a GET request from BuiltWith‚Äôs API endpoint:

```
GET https://api.builtwith.com/
```

---

### üßæ 4. Extract Useful Info

üßÆ **Node Name: `Parse Tech Stack Details`**
üì§ **What it does:**
The raw response from BuiltWith can be messy. This node **cleans up the data** and pulls only what‚Äôs **relevant** ‚Äî like ecommerce platforms, analytics tools, and payment gateways.

üîç *It extracts only the gold from the data mine.*

---

### ‚úÖ **Summary of Section 2:**

This section **fetches and organizes** advanced tech insights about each ecommerce site. No need for you to visit every site or dig through source code!

---

## üíå **Section 3: Smart Summary & Delivery**

**(Nodes: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Generate Stack Summary + 6Ô∏è‚É£ Send Email)**

### ü§ñ 5. Generate Tech Summary with AI

üß† **Node Name: `Generate Stack Summary (AI)`**
üìã **What it does:**
This is where the magic happens! It uses **OpenAI Chat Model** to analyze and summarize the tech stack for each domain in **clear, readable language**.

üßë‚Äçüíª Instead of showing raw JSON or tool names, it says:

> *‚ÄúNike.com uses Shopify for its storefront, integrates Google Tag Manager for analytics, and uses Klarna for payment processing.‚Äù*

üìà You can easily forward this to clients, managers, or teammates.

---

### üì¨ 6. Email the Summary

üì® **Node Name: `Send Summary Email`**
üìß **What it does:**
Finally, this node **sends the generated summaries via Gmail** to a specified email address ‚Äî or even multiple addresses.

üí° You can customize the subject, recipient list, and message format easily.

---

### ‚úÖ **Summary of Section 3:**

This section turns complex data into **natural-language insights** and delivers them **automatically** via email. It's like having your own tech intelligence assistant!

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## üß© **Automated Tech Stack Reporting Workflow**

üéØ *Goal: Automatically fetch and summarize the technology stacks of ecommerce domains every week and email the summary.*

---

üí° **Think of it like a morning alarm** for your workflow. Every week, it starts the process so you never forget to analyze the tech stacks again.

---

üîó *You just need to keep updating your Google Sheet whenever you want to analyze new ecommerce websites.*

`nike.com` ‚Üí Shopify, Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.

```
GET https://api.builtwith.com/
```

üßÆ **Node Name: `Parse Tech Stack Details`**

The raw response from BuiltWith can be messy. This node **cleans up the data** and pulls only what‚Äôs **relevant** ‚Äî like ecommerce platforms, analytics tools, and payment gateways.

### ‚úÖ **Summary of Section 2:**

This section **fetches and organizes** advanced tech insights about each ecommerce site. No need for you to visit every site or dig through source code!

## üíå **Section 3: Smart Summary & Delivery**

**(Nodes: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Generate Stack Summary + 6Ô∏è‚É£ Send Email)**

### ü§ñ 5. Generate Tech Summary with AI

üß† **Node Name: `Generate Stack Summary (AI)`**
üìã **What it does:**
This is where the magic happens! It uses **OpenAI Chat Model** to analyze and summarize the tech stack for each domain in **clear, readable language**.

üßë‚Äçüíª Instead of showing raw JSON or tool names, it says:

> *‚ÄúNike.com uses Shopify for its storefront, integrates Google Tag Manager for analytics, and uses Klarna for payment processing.‚Äù*

üìà You can easily forward this to clients, managers, or teammates.

---

### üì¨ 6. Email the Summary

üì® **Node Name: `Send Summary Email`**
üìß **What it does:**
Finally, this node **sends the generated summaries via Gmail** to a specified email address ‚Äî or even multiple addresses.

üí° You can customize the subject, recipient list, and message format easily.

---

### ‚úÖ **Summary of Section 3:**

This section turns complex data into **natural-language insights** and delivers them **automatically** via email. It's like having your own tech intelligence assistant!

---

## üåü **What Beginners Can Do with This Workflow**

| üõ†Ô∏è Use Case            | ‚úÖ Benefit                                         |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| üß™ **Tech Analysis**    | Learn what tech stacks big ecommerce sites use    |
| üìä **Client Reporting** | Automatically send insights to stakeholders       |
| üß† **AI Integration**   | Understand how LLMs can summarize complex data    |
| üß© **Automation**       | Master scheduling, APIs, and data flows           |
| üíº **Freelance Growth** | Offer it as a service to marketing or dev clients |

---

## üåà **Conclusion:**

This workflow is a **zero-touch**, **AI-powered automation** for ecommerce tech stack analysis that beginners can adopt, modify, and scale for other industries too!
